articles.author: Taylor Lyles
articles.title: EU Probes Apple, Google, and Meta, Alleging They Violated New Antitrust Laws - IGN
articles.description: The European Union announced today that it is investigating Apple, Google, and Meta, alleging these companies are failing to comply with new provisions set by the Digital Markets Act (DMA).
articles.content: The European Union has launched investigations into tech giants Alphabet (the parent company of Google), Apple, and Meta, alleging the companies failed to comply with new antitrust laws set by the EU… [+2879 chars]

articles.author: Dayanne Sousa, Megan Durisin Albery
articles.title: Cocoa Tops $9,000 Mark for First Time on Global Supply Crunch - Bloomberg
articles.description: Cocoa extended its surge — gaining more than $700 per ton in a single day and surpassing $9,000 for the first time ever — as a supply crunch grips the market and chocolate makers grapple for beans.
articles.content:
Cocoa extended its surge gaining more than $700 per ton in a single day and surpassing $9,000 for the first time ever as a supply crunch grips the market and chocolate makers grapple for beans.
